Text: *yawn* Looks like the next class is...swordplay.

Zeta, the intelligence operative, is in charge of
gathering intel from various locations. Sometimes
she blends in with soldiers in conflict zones and
sometimes with merchants in peaceful lands.

She is currently infiltrating a certain Academy on
the outskirts of Midgar Kingdom.
(Gathering intel at the Academy is a breeze.)

(The students talk on and on without any prompting
or actions from me.)

There's a new clothing store on the outskirts of the
capital! Apparently, they have all sorts of cute
designs!

Ooh, I've heard about it! It was opened by the royal
family's exclusive designer who went independent,
right?
(...Not that all the information is helpful.)

(Well, knowing that the royal family had an exclusive
designer is useful intel in its own right.)

Oh, by the way, a cafe just opened recently! I heard
their pancakes are delicious and super popular!

Huh? Pancakes? But I'm a big fan of the pancakes at
our usual cafe...

Rumor is that they serve them heaped with cream and
fruits—it's an entirely new sensation!
A new sensation?! I wanna go after school!
Let's go!
(...Heaped with cream and fruits?! A new sensation?!)

(Ah, close call. I nearly gave in to the lure of
temptation. Come on, focus. You're on a mission.)
Zeta continues to listen attentively to the chatter.
What?! You took that side street?!
Y-Yeah...
There's talk about shady folk roaming there lately...

I-I see. I don't wanna get hurt, so I'll take the
long way home...

(A sharp decline in public safety... I heard similar
stories last week.)

(Where there's smoke, there's fire. I'll mark this as
a subject to investigate further.)

By the way, wasn't that bracelet pretty expensive?
Where'd you get it...?

Oh, you noticed? Nice, huh? My dad got a sudden
promotion, so he gave it to me as a present.

Seriously? Boy, am I jealous! I wish my dad would
also get a sudden promotion!
(...Oh? Sounds like I might have struck gold.)
Whew...
Guess it's time to move on...

(Over the past two weeks I've been here...I've mostly
come across rumors, but there's also been plenty of
useful intel regarding this area.)

(All that's left is to withdraw without arousing
any suspicion...but...)

(Infiltrating the Academy and gathering intel is a
piece of cake. Withdrawing is the tricky part.)

(I might be reported as missing if I disappear out
of the blue, so I'll follow procedure and say I'm
transferring schools.)

(It's not like I made any friends, but it's unnatural
to vanish suddenly...)
Oh well, it is what it is.

A few days later. Zeta's last day at the Academy
arrives.
Thanks for everything...or something like that.

(I've done the rounds enough to avoid suspicion.
Time to report back to the Garden.)

As Zeta is about to leave the Academy, she hears
footsteps approaching quickly from behind her.
H-Hold on, wait!

Yes, that's right! *pant, pant* I'm glad I made it in
time...!

(He looks unfamiliar... I don't recall talking to him
before.)

(Wait, is he working for the Cult?! Did I let my
guard down thinking I was safe at the Academy?!)

(Does he suspect me? Has he been spying on me all
this time? I don't recall giving myself away...)

(My weapon is ready at any moment... Let's see what
he does!)
I-I-I've got something to tell you.
...Something to tell me? Go on.
The thing is, I...
...Huh?
I...I'm in l-l-love with you!
...What?
W-Would you go out with me...?
Huhhh...?
(I-Is this...)
(...a confession...of love?)

(If so, then he's neither working for the Cult nor
has my mission been compromised. No, it's too
early to say for sure.)

(This should be easy to handle. I just need to turn
him down and walk away. Stay calm, stay calm...)
Oh, I-I see. I hadn't realized...

(...Wait, h-huh? How was I supposed to do this again?
That's strange. I should be used to turning down old
geezers and my subordinates in the Garden...)

(Aahh... I don't know how to interact with adolescent
boys... I guess this is the downside of not having
made friends...)

(A-Anyway, I should turn him down properly and
clarify that I'm devoted to another...)
So...

S-Sorry! I have a master who I've devoted my body and
soul to!

The confused Zeta mumbles these unintelligible words
before fleeing.
A few hours later, Zeta returns to the Garden.
Hmm... That wasn't very elegant.

I'm not quite sure I pulled off a student-like
response... It was a bit too contrived and bland...

Hmm... I may encounter the same situation again in
the future, so I'd best mentally rehearse for it...
Ahem...

I'm not interested. ...No, that doesn't sound quite
right.

I appreciate the thought. ...Yeah, that sounds more
the part.
Zeta...what're you doing on your own?
My lord! How long have you been there?

From around when you started the oddly familiar
roleplaying...
Ulp... I let my guard down...

(Oh! But this might be the perfect opportunity! Maybe
Master Shadow can help me...!)
Um, my lord...
Hm?
I-I'd like you to make a confession of love to me!
Huh?! Wh-Why...?!
Wait! No! No! There's a valid reason why I'm asking—!

Zeta composes herself and manages to clear up the
misunderstanding, but she finds herself unable to
get anything done for the rest of the day.
